1.2.name: wordpress/sdn-contributor
1.2.description:
SDN Contributor is a sidebar widget for the WordPress blogging platform. It shows the name and total number of contribution points in SDN. The name will get linked to your SDN Business Card and the points number to a members Contribution Points page.

SDN Contributor can also list latest SDN blog posts for a member. Parts of the visual appearance are configurable e.g. to publishing date and description for each blog post.
